Title: Provides that the maximum vehicle length for special use buses shall be 48 feet and its wall-to-wall turning diameter shall not exceed 90 feet 3 inches
Summary: Provides that the maximum vehicle length for special use buses shall be forty-eight feet and its wall-to-wall turning diameter shall not exceed ninety feet three inches.
LawCode: Amd ยง385, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the maximum vehicle length
